title: Practice Challenge
description: Create a business card using Container with: 1. Rounded corners 2. A nice color or gradient 3. Shadow 4. Padding 5. Your name and title ---
instructions: Create a business card using Container with: 1. Rounded corners 2. A nice color or gradient 3. Shadow 4. Padding 5. Your name and title ---

testCases.expectedOutput: BoxShadow with blur and offset applied

testCases.description: Card displays name, title, and email
testCases.expectedOutput: Text widgets for name, title, and email visible

hints.text: Use `EdgeInsets.all()` for uniform padding inside your card.
For the shadow effect, use the `boxShadow` property inside `BoxDecoration`.
To add multiple pieces of information vertically, use a `Column` as the `child` of your `Container`.

commonMistakes.correction: Use exact case: main not Main, print not Print
